captions.text: You wanna know my secret identity?
How does everybody know.. ehhh I mean..
You just made a serious mistake.
Not as serious as yours, I fear.
Lets not stand on ceremony here. Mr Wayne.

Yea.. I was gonna save them for later but
then I thought, now's good.

You will have to do better than ohhhhh,,,
ok.. that could do it.

Well then get every cop in the city down there
now! Off duty, on duty, I don't care. No matter
what they're doing, gather them up and march them underground and smoke him out!

I don't think thats such a good idea, sir.
I mean what if something happened? We'd have
I think these drugs have me talking crazy.

Maybe just uh, block all the exits and send
in like a SWAT team to smoke him out. Good-
Ok, I'll just scan my hand here.

I seemed to have activated the emergency flood
chambers.

I suppose this will put a hiccup in whatever
plans you had for stealing the reactor, wouldn't it?
Well, get busy swimming or get busy dying.

Prepare yourselves... my father's work is
done.
I can get it out over the bay.

Are you crazy? You are bleeding all over the
place.
I might be bleeding out, but it's ok. Because...
Well, poop. I guess this means we're screwed.

I still can't get over how no important Gotham
characters died in that story.
I mean, like nobody. Even you.

You had your back broken, your heart broken,
your bank account even broken.
How are you still breathing right now?

Nevermind, I already know what you're gonna
say.
Oh heck no, I'm not wearing that.

Special thanks to Max and Dan from the Creature
Hub, who supplied their voice work.

Watch some more videos. And please leave us
a comment so we can..
Move the microphone away from your face.

Move the microphone closer to my face? Is
that what you said?

title: How The Dark Knight Rises Should Have Ended
